00060 /* style + theme + layout-engine = UI */
00061 
00062 /* 
00063  * This is a complete set of layout rules, the 'state' of the Layout 
00064  * Engine. Multiple styles are possible, defined via C or Python. Styles 
00065  * get a name, and will typically get activated per region type, like 
00066  * "Header", or "Listview" or "Toolbar". Properties of Style definitions 
00067  * are:
00068  *
00069  * - default column properties, internal spacing, aligning, min/max width
00070  * - button alignment rules (for groups)
00071  * - label placement rules
00072  * - internal labeling or external labeling default
00073  * - default minimum widths for buttons/labels (in amount of characters)
00074  * - font types, styles and relative sizes for Panel titles, labels, etc.
00075  */
00076 
00077 
00078 /* ********************************************** */
00079 
00080 static uiStyle *ui_style_new(ListBase *styles, const char *name, short uifont_id)
00081 {
00082     uiStyle *style = MEM_callocN(sizeof(uiStyle), "new style");
00083     
00084     BLI_addtail(styles, style);
00085     BLI_strncpy(style->name, name, MAX_STYLE_NAME);
00086     
00087     style->panelzoom = 1.0; /* unused */
00088 
00089     style->paneltitle.uifont_id = uifont_id;
00090     style->paneltitle.points = 12;
00091     style->paneltitle.kerning = 1;
00092     style->paneltitle.shadow = 1;
00093     style->paneltitle.shadx = 0;
00094     style->paneltitle.shady = -1;
00095     style->paneltitle.shadowalpha = 0.15f;
00096     style->paneltitle.shadowcolor = 1.0f;
00097 
00098     style->grouplabel.uifont_id = uifont_id;
00099     style->grouplabel.points = 12;
00100     style->grouplabel.kerning = 1;
00101     style->grouplabel.shadow = 3;
00102     style->grouplabel.shadx = 0;
00103     style->grouplabel.shady = -1;
00104     style->grouplabel.shadowalpha = 0.25f;
00105 
00106     style->widgetlabel.uifont_id = uifont_id;
00107     style->widgetlabel.points = 11;
00108     style->widgetlabel.kerning = 1;
00109     style->widgetlabel.shadow = 3;
00110     style->widgetlabel.shadx = 0;
00111     style->widgetlabel.shady = -1;
00112     style->widgetlabel.shadowalpha = 0.15f;
00113     style->widgetlabel.shadowcolor = 1.0f;
00114 
00115     style->widget.uifont_id = uifont_id;
00116     style->widget.points = 11;
00117     style->widget.kerning = 1;
00118     style->widget.shadowalpha = 0.25f;
00119 
00120     style->columnspace = 8;
00121     style->templatespace = 5;
00122     style->boxspace = 5;
00123     style->buttonspacex = 8;
00124     style->buttonspacey = 2;
00125     style->panelspace = 8;
00126     style->panelouter = 4;
00127     
00128     return style;
00129 }
00130 
00131 static uiFont *uifont_to_blfont(int id)
00132 {
00133     uiFont *font = U.uifonts.first;
00134     
00135     for (; font; font = font->next) {
00136         if (font->uifont_id == id) {
00137             return font;
00138         }
00139     }
00140     return U.uifonts.first;
00141 }

00145 
00146 void uiStyleFontDrawExt(uiFontStyle *fs, rcti *rect, const char *str,
00147                         float *r_xofs, float *r_yofs)
00148 {
00149     float height;
00150     int xofs = 0, yofs;
00151     
00152     uiStyleFontSet(fs);
00153 
00154     height = BLF_ascender(fs->uifont_id);
00155     yofs = ceil(0.5f * (rect->ymax - rect->ymin - height));
00156 
00157     if (fs->align == UI_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER) {
00158         xofs = floor(0.5f * (rect->xmax - rect->xmin - BLF_width(fs->uifont_id, str)));
00159         /* don't center text if it chops off the start of the text, 2 gives some margin */
00160         if (xofs < 2) {
00161             xofs = 2;
00162         }
00163     }
00164     else if (fs->align == UI_STYLE_TEXT_RIGHT) {
00165         xofs = rect->xmax - rect->xmin - BLF_width(fs->uifont_id, str) - 1;
00166     }
00167     
00168     /* clip is very strict, so we give it some space */
00169     BLF_clipping(fs->uifont_id, rect->xmin - 1, rect->ymin - 4, rect->xmax + 1, rect->ymax + 4);
00170     BLF_enable(fs->uifont_id, BLF_CLIPPING);
00171     BLF_position(fs->uifont_id, rect->xmin + xofs, rect->ymin + yofs, 0.0f);
00172 
00173     if (fs->shadow) {
00174         BLF_enable(fs->uifont_id, BLF_SHADOW);
00175         BLF_shadow(fs->uifont_id, fs->shadow, fs->shadowcolor, fs->shadowcolor, fs->shadowcolor, fs->shadowalpha);
00176         BLF_shadow_offset(fs->uifont_id, fs->shadx, fs->shady);
00177     }
00178 
00179     if (fs->kerning == 1)
00180         BLF_enable(fs->uifont_id, BLF_KERNING_DEFAULT);
00181 
00182     BLF_draw(fs->uifont_id, str, BLF_DRAW_STR_DUMMY_MAX);
00183     BLF_disable(fs->uifont_id, BLF_CLIPPING);
00184     if (fs->shadow)
00185         BLF_disable(fs->uifont_id, BLF_SHADOW);
00186     if (fs->kerning == 1)
00187         BLF_disable(fs->uifont_id, BLF_KERNING_DEFAULT);
00188 
00189     *r_xofs = xofs;
00190     *r_yofs = yofs;
00191 }
00192 
00193 void uiStyleFontDraw(uiFontStyle *fs, rcti *rect, const char *str)
00194 {
00195     float xofs, yofs;
00196     uiStyleFontDrawExt(fs, rect, str,
00197                        &xofs, &yofs);
00198 }
00199 
00200 /* drawn same as above, but at 90 degree angle */
00201 void uiStyleFontDrawRotated(uiFontStyle *fs, rcti *rect, const char *str)
00202 {
00203     float height;
00204     int xofs, yofs;
00205     float angle;
00206     rcti txtrect;
00207 
00208     uiStyleFontSet(fs);
00209 
00210     height = BLF_ascender(fs->uifont_id);
00211     /* becomes x-offset when rotated */
00212     xofs = ceil(0.5f * (rect->ymax - rect->ymin - height));
00213 
00214     /* ignore UI_STYLE, always aligned to top */
00215 
00216     /* rotate counter-clockwise for now (assumes left-to-right language)*/
00217     xofs += height;
00218     yofs = BLF_width(fs->uifont_id, str) + 5;
00219     angle = 90.0f;
00220 
00221     /* translate rect to vertical */
00222     txtrect.xmin = rect->xmin - (rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
00223     txtrect.ymin = rect->ymin - (rect->xmax - rect->xmin);
00224     txtrect.xmax = rect->xmin;
00225     txtrect.ymax = rect->ymin;
00226 
00227     /* clip is very strict, so we give it some space */
00228     /* clipping is done without rotation, so make rect big enough to contain both positions */
00229     BLF_clipping(fs->uifont_id, txtrect.xmin - 1, txtrect.ymin - yofs - xofs - 4, rect->xmax + 1, rect->ymax + 4);
00230     BLF_enable(fs->uifont_id, BLF_CLIPPING);
00231     BLF_position(fs->uifont_id, txtrect.xmin + xofs, txtrect.ymax - yofs, 0.0f);
00232 
00233     BLF_enable(fs->uifont_id, BLF_ROTATION);
00234     BLF_rotation(fs->uifont_id, angle);
00235 
00236     if (fs->shadow) {
00237         BLF_enable(fs->uifont_id, BLF_SHADOW);
00238         BLF_shadow(fs->uifont_id, fs->shadow, fs->shadowcolor, fs->shadowcolor, fs->shadowcolor, fs->shadowalpha);
00239         BLF_shadow_offset(fs->uifont_id, fs->shadx, fs->shady);
00240     }
00241 
00242     if (fs->kerning == 1)
00243         BLF_enable(fs->uifont_id, BLF_KERNING_DEFAULT);
00244 
00245     BLF_draw(fs->uifont_id, str, BLF_DRAW_STR_DUMMY_MAX);
00246     BLF_disable(fs->uifont_id, BLF_ROTATION);
00247     BLF_disable(fs->uifont_id, BLF_CLIPPING);
00248     if (fs->shadow)
00249         BLF_disable(fs->uifont_id, BLF_SHADOW);
00250     if (fs->kerning == 1)
00251         BLF_disable(fs->uifont_id, BLF_KERNING_DEFAULT);
00252 }

00254 /* ************** helpers ************************ */
00255 /* XXX: read a style configure */
00256 uiStyle *UI_GetStyle(void)
00257 {
00258     uiStyle *style = NULL;
00259     /* offset is two struct uiStyle pointers */
00260     /* style = BLI_findstring( &U.uistyles, "Unifont Style", sizeof(style)*2 ) */;
00261     return (style != NULL) ? style : U.uistyles.first;
00262 }
00263 
00264 /* temporarily, does widget font */
00265 int UI_GetStringWidth(const char *str)
00266 {
00267     uiStyle *style = UI_GetStyle();
00268     uiFontStyle *fstyle = &style->widget;
00269     int width;
00270     
00271     if (fstyle->kerning == 1) /* for BLF_width */
00272         BLF_enable(fstyle->uifont_id, BLF_KERNING_DEFAULT);
00273     
00274     uiStyleFontSet(fstyle);
00275     width = BLF_width(fstyle->uifont_id, str);
00276     
00277     if (fstyle->kerning == 1)
00278         BLF_disable(fstyle->uifont_id, BLF_KERNING_DEFAULT);
00279     
00280     return width;
00281 }
00282 
00283 /* temporarily, does widget font */
00284 void UI_DrawString(float x, float y, const char *str)
00285 {
00286     uiStyle *style = UI_GetStyle();
00287     
00288     if (style->widget.kerning == 1)
00289         BLF_enable(style->widget.uifont_id, BLF_KERNING_DEFAULT);
00290 
00291     uiStyleFontSet(&style->widget);
00292     BLF_position(style->widget.uifont_id, x, y, 0.0f);
00293     BLF_draw(style->widget.uifont_id, str, BLF_DRAW_STR_DUMMY_MAX);
00294 
00295     if (style->widget.kerning == 1)
00296         BLF_disable(style->widget.uifont_id, BLF_KERNING_DEFAULT);
00297 }

00299 /* ************** init exit ************************ */
00300 
00301 /* called on each startup.blend read */
00302 /* reading without uifont will create one */
00303 void uiStyleInit(void)
00304 {
00305     uiFont *font = U.uifonts.first;
00306     uiStyle *style = U.uistyles.first;
00307     
00308     /* recover from uninitialized dpi */
00309     if (U.dpi == 0)
00310         U.dpi = 72;
00311     CLAMP(U.dpi, 48, 128);
00312     
00313     /* default builtin */
00314     if (font == NULL) {
00315         font = MEM_callocN(sizeof(uiFont), "ui font");
00316         BLI_addtail(&U.uifonts, font);
00317         
00318         BLI_strncpy(font->filename, "default", sizeof(font->filename));
00319         font->uifont_id = UIFONT_DEFAULT;
00320     }
00321     
00322     for (font = U.uifonts.first; font; font = font->next) {
00323         
00324         if (font->uifont_id == UIFONT_DEFAULT) {
00325 #ifdef WITH_INTERNATIONAL
00326             int font_size = datatoc_bfont_ttf_size;
00327             unsigned char *font_ttf = (unsigned char *)datatoc_bfont_ttf;
00328             static int last_font_size = 0;
00329 
00330             /* use unicode font for translation */
00331             if (U.transopts & USER_DOTRANSLATE) {
00332                 font_ttf = BLF_get_unifont(&font_size);
00333 
00334                 if (!font_ttf) {
00335                     /* fall back if not found */
00336                     font_size = datatoc_bfont_ttf_size;
00337                     font_ttf = (unsigned char *)datatoc_bfont_ttf;
00338                 }
00339             }
00340 
00341             /* relload only if needed */
00342             if (last_font_size != font_size) {
00343                 BLF_unload("default");
00344                 last_font_size = font_size;
00345             }
00346 
00347             font->blf_id = BLF_load_mem("default", font_ttf, font_size);
00348 #else
00349             font->blf_id = BLF_load_mem("default", (unsigned char *)datatoc_bfont_ttf, datatoc_bfont_ttf_size);
00350 #endif
00351         }       
00352         else {
00353             font->blf_id = BLF_load(font->filename);
00354             if (font->blf_id == -1)
00355                 font->blf_id = BLF_load_mem("default", (unsigned char *)datatoc_bfont_ttf, datatoc_bfont_ttf_size);
00356         }
00357 
00358         if (font->blf_id == -1) {
00359             if (G.debug & G_DEBUG)
00360                 printf("%s: error, no fonts available\n", __func__);
00361         }
00362         else {
00363             /* ? just for speed to initialize?
00364              * Yes, this build the glyph cache and create
00365              * the texture.
00366              */
00367             BLF_size(font->blf_id, 11, U.dpi);
00368             BLF_size(font->blf_id, 12, U.dpi);
00369             BLF_size(font->blf_id, 14, U.dpi);
00370         }
00371     }
00372     
00373     if (style == NULL) {
00374         ui_style_new(&U.uistyles, "Default Style", UIFONT_DEFAULT);
00375     }
00376     
00377     // XXX, this should be moved into a style, but for now best only load the monospaced font once.
00378     if (blf_mono_font == -1)
00379         blf_mono_font = BLF_load_mem_unique("monospace", (unsigned char *)datatoc_bmonofont_ttf, datatoc_bmonofont_ttf_size);
00380 
00381     BLF_size(blf_mono_font, 12, 72);
00382     
00383     /* second for rendering else we get threading problems */
00384     if (blf_mono_font_render == -1)
00385         blf_mono_font_render = BLF_load_mem_unique("monospace", (unsigned char *)datatoc_bmonofont_ttf, datatoc_bmonofont_ttf_size);
00386 
00387     BLF_size(blf_mono_font_render, 12, 72);
00388 }
00389 
00390 void uiStyleFontSet(uiFontStyle *fs)
00391 {
00392     uiFont *font = uifont_to_blfont(fs->uifont_id);
00393     
00394     BLF_size(font->blf_id, fs->points, U.dpi);
00395 }
